Uses of Interface
org.apache.sis.storage.GridCoverageResource

Packages that use GridCoverageResource
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Widgets showing GridCoverage images or sample values.
org.apache.sis.storage
Data store base types for retrieving and saving geospatial data in various storage formats.
org.apache.sis.storage.aggregate
Resources which are aggregations or concatenations of other resources.
org.apache.sis.storage.geotiff
A data store that can read and write GeoTIFF files as grid coverages.
